title: Gilmore Girls: A Year in the Life
synopsis: Set nearly a decade after the finale of the original series, this revival follows Lorelai, Rory and Emily Gilmore through four seasons of change.
cast: Lauren Graham, Alexis Bledel, Kelly Bishop

episodes.title: Winter
episodes.synopsis: Fresh from a career high, Rory pays a visit to Stars Hollow. Emily copes with Richard’s death. The inn keeps Lorelai busy as she ponders her future.

episodes.title: Spring
episodes.synopsis: As Rory's secret London love affair continues, working on her book proposal becomes increasingly difficult. Lorelai and Emily go to therapy together.

episodes.title: Summer
episodes.synopsis: Rory tries to save the Stars Hollow Gazette from shutting down. Lorelai sits on the advisory committee for Taylor’s musical. Rory worries about Emily.

episodes.title: Fall
episodes.synopsis: At odds with the most important people in her life, Lorelai seeks wisdom in nature. Rory goes out for a wild night with an unexpected crowd.
